terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to DynoPay. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by the following Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: DynoPay is a digital payment platform that provides wallet-based balance management, bank transfers, and cryptocurrency transactions. These Terms govern your use of our website, platform, and services.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content:
To use DynoPay, you must:
 • At least 18 years old
 • Capable of entering into a legally binding agreement
 • Not located in a restricted or sanctioned jurisdiction

We reserve the right to reject or terminate any account that violates these requirements.

userAccount.title: 3. User Account
userAccount.content:
To access certain features, you may be required to register an account. You agree to:
 • Provide accurate and complete information
 • Keep your login credentials confidential
 • Be fully responsible for all activity under your account

DynoPay is not liable for any unauthorized access resulting from your failure to secure your account.

permittedUse.title: 4. Permitted Use
permittedUse.content:
You agree to use DynoPay only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws. Prohibited uses include, but are not limited to:
 • Money laundering, terrorist financing, or fraud
 • Using stolen or unauthorized payment methods
 • Engaging in activities that violate sanctions or embargoes
 • Attempting to bypass identity verification or security measures

paymentsFees.title: 5. Payments & Fees
paymentsFees.content:
• Wallet Balance: You may top up your wallet via supported payment methods.
• Bank Transfers: Subject to processing time and applicable fees.
• Crypto Payments: Only supported cryptocurrencies are accepted. We are not responsible for incorrect addresses or network delays.
• Fees and exchange rates may apply and are visible before confirming any transaction.

riskDisclosure.title: 6. Risk Disclosure
riskDisclosure.content:
Using cryptocurrencies carries inherent risks including volatility, network errors, and regulatory changes. You acknowledge and accept these risks when using DynoPay.
We do not offer investment advice or financial guarantees.

amlKyc.title: 7. AML & KYC
amlKyc.content: All users must comply with our AML Policy. We may request verification documents at any time and may freeze or terminate accounts for suspicious activity.

suspension.title: 8. Account Suspension & Termination
suspension.content:
We may suspend or terminate your access to DynoPay without notice if:
 • You breach these Terms
 • We suspect unauthorized or unlawful activity
 • Required by law enforcement or regulators

Upon termination, we may restrict access to funds pending investigation.

intellectualProperty.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, logos, trademarks, and code on the DynoPay platform are the property of DynoPay or its licensors. You may not copy, distribute, or reverse engineer any part of the service without permission.

disclaimer.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content:
DynoPay is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:
 • Continuous or error-free service
 • That any transaction will be completed
 • Accuracy of third-party data (e.g., exchange rates)

liability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
To the maximum extent permitted by law, DynoPay is not liable for:
 • Indirect or consequential losses
 • Loss of funds due to user error (e.g., wrong wallet address)
 • Network failures or force majeure events

modifications.title: 12. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. If material changes are made, we will notify users via email or on-platform notice. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Portugal. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
support@dynopay.com

aml.title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Policy
aml.intro: At DynoPay, we are committed to upholding the highest standards in preventing money laundering and the financing of terrorism. This Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Policy outlines the measures and procedures we have implemented to detect, prevent, and report any suspicious activity across our services, including:

purpose.title: 1. Purpose
purpose.content: The purpose of this policy is to ensure that DynoPay complies with all applicable AML and Counter-Terrorist Financing (CTF) laws and regulations. We are dedicated to identifying and mitigating risks associated with money laundering and to protecting our platform from being used for illicit purposes.

riskBased.title: 2. Risk-Based Approach
riskBased.content: DynoPay follows a risk-based approach in assessing its clients and transactions. Based on the level of risk, we apply appropriate levels of due diligence and monitoring.

kyc.title: 3. Know Your Customer (KYC)
kyc.content:
We have established a comprehensive KYC (Know Your Customer) program to verify the identity of our users. Depending on the account type and transaction volume, KYC requirements may include:
 • Full name and date of birth
 • Government-issued identification
 • Proof of address
 • Source of funds (for higher-risk activities)

KYC procedures apply to both fiat and crypto-related operations.

monitoring.title: 4. Ongoing Monitoring
monitoring.content:
All transactions processed through DynoPay are subject to ongoing monitoring to detect unusual or suspicious behavior. This includes, but is not limited to:
 • Unusual movement of funds
 • Use of high-risk jurisdictions
 • Use of anonymizing services or tools

We reserve the right to delay, block, or refuse transactions that raise red flags during monitoring.

reporting.title: 5. Reporting Suspicious Activities
reporting.content: In accordance with applicable AML laws, DynoPay is obligated to report any suspected money laundering or suspicious activity to the relevant authorities. Users are not notified when such reports are made, in compliance with legal requirements.

training.title: 6. Employee Training
training.content: Our staff receives regular training in AML procedures, red flag indicators, and legal responsibilities. This ensures our team is equipped to recognize and respond to suspicious activity appropriately.

records.title: 7. Record Keeping
records.content: DynoPay maintains detailed records of all user identification data, transactions, and AML reviews for a minimum period of 5 years, or as otherwise required by law.

crypto.title: 8. Cryptocurrency-Specific Measures
crypto.content: Given the unique nature of digital assets, DynoPay implements enhanced due diligence and blockchain analysis tools to monitor the flow of crypto assets. We do not support or tolerate the use of our platform for mixing/tumbling services or privacy coins designed to obscure the source of funds.

userResponsibility.title: 9. User Responsibility
userResponsibility.content: By using DynoPay, users agree to comply with this AML Policy and cooperate with any compliance-related requests. Failure to do so may result in account suspension, reporting to authorities, or permanent termination.
